io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.services

Interface IPlatformScheduler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractScheduler, NativeThreadPoolScheduler

    public interface IPlatformScheduler
    Implements a platform dependent scheduler to schedule a synchronization job or handle on-demand sync.

    The implementation must handle adding or removing a new schedule.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IPlatformScheduler cancel()
      Cancel all queued scheduled jobs and terminate the timer threads as soon as possible.
      String scheduleAtFixedRate(Runnable job, long period)
      Schedule a re-occurring job with a timer at a fixed timing rate.
      IPlatformScheduler scheduleForImmediateExecution(Runnable job)
      Schedule a single job for immediate background execution.
      IPlatformScheduler stopSchedule(String jobKey)
      Stop the scheduled job, identified with a key.

    • Method Detail

      • scheduleForImmediateExecution

        IPlatformScheduler scheduleForImmediateExecution(Runnable job)
        Schedule a single job for immediate background execution.

        The job is started on a separate timer thread immediately, but only once.

        Parameters:
        job - the runnable to to execute. In case it is null, the schedule is ignored.
        Returns:
        this.

      • scheduleAtFixedRate

        String scheduleAtFixedRate(Runnable job,
                           long period)
        Schedule a re-occurring job with a timer at a fixed timing rate.

        Starting from this very millisecond, the job is executed after every period milliseconds have passed. period is also used as initial delay. So in case it is set to one hour (= 3600000 milliseconds), the job is first executed in an hour and then every hour afterwards.

        There is no check whether the same instance is added again.

        Parameters:
        job - the runnable to to execute. In case it is null, the schedule is ignored.
        period - the period in milliseconds to execute the job.
        Returns:
        a key to the scheduled job, that can be used to remove the schedule later with stopSchedule(String).

      • stopSchedule

        IPlatformScheduler stopSchedule(String jobKey)
        Stop the scheduled job, identified with a key.
        Parameters:
        jobKey - As returned by #schedule(Runnable)
        Returns:
        this to support Fluent Interface.

      • cancel

        IPlatformScheduler cancel()
        Cancel all queued scheduled jobs and terminate the timer threads as soon as possible.

        The currently running job is not terminated. Only the queue is cleared and all schedules cancelled.

        Returns:
        this to support Fluent Interface.
